text: 'inma al'iithm wallwm ealaa al'aghnia' aladhin ja'uk -ayha alrswl- yatlubun al'idhn baltkhlf, wahum almunafiqun al'aghnia' akhtaru lanfshm alqewd mae alnisa' wa'ahl alaedhar, wakhatam allah ealaa qulubuhum balnfaq, fala ydkhlha 'iyman, fahum la yaelamun su' eaqbthm btkhlfhm eank watarakahum aljhad mek
